title: A 'Digital New Deal' Is Here | Guests: Ken Paxton & Michael Pack | 12/9/20
description:
Pennsylvania has new extreme coronavirus restrictions. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton breaks down Texas’ election lawsuit filed against four battleground states. Glenn was born to play the role of a seductive Colonel Sanders, but Lifetime cast Mario Lopez instead. The Heartland Institute’s Justin Haskins talks the “Digital New Deal” and Big Tech censorship of free speech. Dictionary.com changed its definition of "court packing." Elon Musk made the move to Texas, but will Tesla follow? Michael Pack, CEO of the U.S. Agency for Global Media, theorizes what media coverage would look like under a Biden administration. Is General Motors done with Cadillac? A boxing match between Jake Paul and Nate Robinson is being called racist.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
itunes:subtitle: The American people have lost trust in government officials and the media as we face a "Digital New Deal".
